about_the_game:
"Gaung ['gūh-üng] - A repeated sound caused by the reflection of a sound wave"

But when the voice returns distorted, maybe it's not answering your voice, it's calling you back!

Gaung is a short and immersive horror adventure that plunges players into the eerie depths of an ancient cave, rumored to be haunted by forgotten energies and lingering shadows of the past. As Rani, a young woman who agrees to a midnight exploration of the infamous Gaung Cave at her friend’s request, players will uncover secrets of lost rituals, forbidden sacrifices, and unsettling apparitions. What begins as a thrill-seeking journey soon spirals into a chilling nightmare, as Rani finds herself trapped and forced to unravel the cave’s dark past to survive.

Features:

  • Chilling Atmosphere: Explore haunting caves and mysterious passageways with carefully crafted lighting and soundscapes to evoke real, spine-tingling horror.

  • Intriguing Storyline: Uncover the sinister secrets of Gaung Cave, rooted in legends of ancient rites and untold sacrifices.

  • Puzzles and Survival Mechanics: Solve intricate puzzles and use survival strategies as you navigate dark corridors, recover helpful items like flashlights and ancient clues, and escape relentless entities that haunt the cave's shadows.

Will you survive the echoes of Gaung?

content_descriptors.notes:
"Gaung" includes horror elements and depictions that may be unsettling or intense for some players. The game portrays suspenseful scenarios with ghost encounters, atmospheric sound effects, and dark environments.

Note: Sensitive topics related to folklore and spiritual rituals may be part of the game's narrative, so player discretion is advised.

name: Gaung

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3470 or AMD™ Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770 or AMD FX™-9590
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1660 or AMD Radeon™ RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Experience the spine-chilling horror game where you explore the haunted depths of an ancient cave shrouded in mystery. As Rani, you will navigate cryptic puzzles, eerie spirits, and survive the supernatural to uncover dark secrets and escape with your life.
